author: atsatsos97
body:
PR description:
This PR adds the monitoring of the diphoton paths currently in the HLT menu, including the unprescaled path introduced into HLT menu V1.2 by EXO through this [JIRA ticket](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2282).

PR validation:
Basic tests performed successfully using a TTbar sample and starting from CMSSW_12_5_X_2022-07-28-2300/src:
scram b distclean
git cms-checkdeps -a -A
scram b -j 8
scram b runtests
scram build code-checks
scram build code-format
runTheMatrix.py -l 11634.0

As well as a test looking at 100 events from the TTbar sample, in which histograms were correctly produced and filled with events:
runTheMatrix.py -l 11634.0

If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
Not a backport.
title: DQM for DiPhoton Paths in EXO/HIG PAGs
